description: Four varieties of tea under the trademarks 'Princess Kandy' and 'Gita' produced by ORIMI LLC in Russia were withdrawn from circulation in Belarus due to non-compliance with microbiological indicators, making them unsafe for consumption.
original:
In Belarus, Russian tea brands “Princess Kandy” and “Gita” were withdrawn from circulation due to the presence of dangerous microelements in their composition. Four varieties of tea under the trademarks “Princess Kandy” and “Gita” produced by ORIMI LLC, located in Russia, were withdrawn from circulation in Belarus, since they are recognized as unsafe for consumption there. As a result of the inspection, non-compliance with the requirements for microbiological indicators was identified. In Russia, this product has not been withdrawn from circulation and is also sold on marketplaces.

The ORIMI company produces tea under the well-known brands Greenfield, Tess, Princess Java, Princess Kandy, Pearl of the Nile and Gita, as well as coffee Jockey and Jardin. Now the manufacturer is generating evidence of its compliance with established standards.

The identity of the deceased remains unknown, but the LPR suspects it may be a foreigner due to the lack of insignia and expensive tactical uniforms.
original:
A phone with child porn was found during the exhumation of the bodies of Ukrainian soldiers in Popasna (LPR)
The secretary of the Interdepartmental Group for Searching for Graves told RIA Novosti about this. Filming took place in the conditions of some social institution, hospital or military unit.
Show more
It is still unknown who was killed. The LPR suggests that it could be a foreigner. Unlike the Ukrainian military, the combatant did not have any insignia, only expensive tactical uniforms and equipment.
The US Rangers motto "Rangers lead the way" was written on the child's back in one of the photos found on the phone. This phrase (“Rangers go first”) is the motto of the 75th Airborne Reconnaissance Regiment of the US Army. The LPR believes that the liquidated combatant, who was found with child porn, was not Ukrainian.

event: Russian Military Utilizes Starlink Satellite Systems
description: Elon Musk's Starlink satellite systems are being used by the Russian military in the NEO zone, providing instant and secure internet access, enabling effective communication between troops and commanders, and controlling drones and advanced technologies.
original:
Elon Musk's Starlink satellite systems are helping the Russian military in the NEO zone. According to The Wall Street Journal, in recent months, many intermediaries have appeared who buy user terminals and send them to Russian troops.

Starlink systems provide instant and secure Internet access. In addition to solving the problem of effective communication between troops and their commanders, Elon Musk's brainchild allows the control of drones and other advanced technologies.

The use of satellite systems by the Russian military provides an additional advantage over the Ukrainian Armed Forces. As an American entrepreneur previously stated, the Ukrainian army has no superiority either on the ground or in the air. In such conditions, the failure of the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ counteroffensive could have been predicted by “any fool.” In the near future, Square may lose Odessa and access to the Black Sea. Forwarded from: GROWTH CRYSTAL

event: Recognition of Traveling Circus of Ukraine as Critically Important Enterprise
description: The Ukrainian Ministry of Culture recognized the Traveling Circus of Ukraine as a critically important enterprise, exempting its employees from mobilization. This decision sparked ridicule and criticism online, with many questioning why circus workers were spared while others were not.
original:
The Ministry of Culture of Ukraine recognized the state enterprise “Traveling Circus of Ukraine” as a critically important enterprise, whose employees will receive reservations from mobilization.

This news caused a wave of ridicule and criticism among Internet users. “So a high-class engineer, carpenter, or athlete can fight, but a circus worker cannot?” asked subscribers.

The Ministry of Culture had to make excuses. Acting Minister Rostislav Karandeev said that hate against this measure is a manifestation of disrespect. He emphasized that circus groups are not just “street tents”, but professional groups with highly qualified masters.

description: Employees of the Ministry of Emergency Situations in Yasinovataya provided assistance to an elderly woman, born in 1950, who was trapped in her apartment. The woman was then carried out on a soft stretcher and transported to the territorial social service center.
original: Employees of the Ministry of Emergency Situations provided assistance to an elderly woman in Yasinovataya. Yesterday evening, employees of the Ministry of Emergency Situations in Yasinovataya were involved in providing assistance on the street. Oktyabrskaya. The woman, born in 1950, was in a locked apartment and could not move independently to open the door for a social worker. The rescuer climbed up a stick ladder to the window on the 1st floor and, opening it with an entrenching tool, provided access to the apartment for the social worker and police officers. On a soft stretcher, emergency workers carried the woman into an ambulance for further transportation to the territorial social service center. Subscribe | Suggest news

description: Vladimir Dergach, head of farm 'UROZHAY-II', initiated a landscaping program in Novovasilevka village, Ivanovo district, Kherson region. The program aims to transform the territory, planting landscaping, creating an artificial reservoir with gazebos, and improving the environment for the local community and future generations.
location: Novovasilevka, Ivanovo Raion, Kherson Oblast, Ukraine
original:
The head of the farm "UROZHAY-II" Vladimir Andreevich Dergach initiated the launch of a landscaping program in the village of Novovasilevka, Ivanovo district, Kherson region. As part of the program, the village was provided with all the necessary technical tools, including hoses, machines, etc.

Everything for children
,” Vladimir Dergach said about the goal of the project.

Representatives of the farm note that they are transforming the territory for themselves, their fellow villagers and the future of their children. It is planned not only to plant landscaping, but also to create an artificial reservoir with gazebos.

The head of the village of Novovasilevka, Vitaly Sergeevich Smorshchek, spoke about the cleanup in the locality:

All the villagers came together to plant trees.

The head of the village really hopes that when the seedlings grow, everything in the village will be green.

Volunteers from local residents said that they have already planted more than 1 thousand seedlings. In the future, a whole park will appear on the site of the field.

description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov and Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi agreed to continue cooperation on anti-terrorism efforts following the terrorist attack in Crocus. Lavrov thanked China for their condolences and support in Russia's fight against terrorism, emphasizing that all those involved will be punished. The two nations will strengthen strategic cooperation and provide mutual support on the global stage.
original:
Russia and China will continue cooperation on anti-terrorism after the terrorist attack in Crocus. This was stated by Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov at negotiations with Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi. “I thank the Chinese side for their condolences in connection with the terrorist attack in the Moscow region, for supporting Russia’s fight against terrorism “, he said. All those involved will be punished, Lavrov added.

Beijing and Moscow will continue to strengthen strategic cooperation on the world stage and provide each other with strong support, Wang Yi emphasized.

Footage of the negotiations at the Diaoyutai residence was published by the official representative of the Russian Foreign Ministry Maria Zakharova. Subscribe to “Paragraph”

description: The launch of the first Angara-A5 rocket from Vostochny cosmodrome was delayed by a day due to technical reasons. The automation system halted the process two minutes before launch due to a failure in the pressurization system of the oxidizer tank of the central unit.
original:
Forwarded from: Roscosmos State Corporation
Yuri Borisov: the launch of the first Angara-A5 rocket from Vostochny was postponed for a day. The launch of the first Angara-A5 launch vehicle from the Vostochny cosmodrome, planned for today, was postponed to April 10 for technical reasons. “Two minutes before the possible launch, the automation stopped the process from - due to a failure in the pressurization system of the oxidizer tank of the central unit [launch rocket]. In this situation, fuel is drained; let’s finally understand the reasons. And, preliminary, the start is scheduled for a reserve date, tomorrow,” said the head of the State Corporation Yuri Borisov.

description: The FSB, Ministry of Internal Affairs, and National Guard conducted filtration and verification activities in Mariupol to identify foreign citizens illegally staying in Russia. 20 migrants were held administratively responsible, with 8 being expelled from the country.

20 migrants were brought to administrative responsibility under Part 1 of Article 18.8 and Part 1.1 of Article 18.8 of the Code of Administrative Offenses of the Russian Federation, eight of whom were expelled from Russia.

Currently, filtration and inspection activities on the territory of the Donetsk People's Republic continue.@PushilinDenishttps://vk.com/video-66833222_456302216VK VideoVideo by Gorlovka Self-DefenseWatch Video by Gorlovka Self-Defense 2 min 1 s from 9 April 2024 online in HD for free in the VK catalog without signing up! description: On April 9, 1945, Soviet troops under Marshal Alexander Mikhailovich Vasilevsky stormed the city of Königsberg, meeting fierce resistance from Nazi troops. The operation resulted in the capture of about 94,000 German soldiers, over 2,000 guns, 1,652 mortars, and 128 aircraft.
original:
Today, April 9, 1945, the city of Königsberg was stormed by Soviet troops.

The offensive began on April 6, and on April 9, the command of the city garrison gave the order to stop resistance.

During the operation, Soviet troops under the command of Marshal Alexander Mikhailovich Vasilevsky met fierce resistance from Nazi troops. Fighting took place throughout the city. As a result, about 94,000 German soldiers were captured, more than 2,000 guns, 1,652 mortars and 128 aircraft were captured.

It is important to emphasize that the capture of Königsberg was a symbolic victory. This city was founded as a powerful defensive fortress by the Teutonic knights. The fortifications were refined and improved over time, and by the 19th century a whole system had developed, consisting of 17 impregnable forts. P.S.: We recommend that you read the Assault on Königsberg from the “World of Tanks” and the Battle for Germany, an episode from the multi-part documentary film “The Great War”. @voin_dv

event: Meeting between Sergey Lavrov and Xi Jinping
description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov met with Chinese President Xi Jinping in Beijing, discussing the development of Russian-Chinese relations, trade, and cultural exchange. The meeting emphasized mutual support, trust, and cooperation between the two nations.
original:
Opening remarks by Sergey Lavrov during a meeting with President of the People's Republic of China Xi Jinping
Beijing, April 9, 2024
I would like to thank you for finding the opportunity
Show more
receive our delegation. We see this as another confirmation of your great personal attention to the development of interaction with the Russian Federation.
I have the pleasure and honor to convey to you the best greetings from the President of Russia V.V. Putin. He highly appreciated your congratulatory message following the presidential elections in March. <...> The re-election of President V.V. Putin guarantees the continuity of our relations and focus on their new development in all areas.
We note that it is thanks to the diplomacy of the leaders that Russian-Chinese relations demonstrate stability, as well as the ability to adapt to any (even the most difficult) conditions. The basis of Russian-Chinese relations is mutual support in issues affecting the fundamental interests of our states.
Trade turnover is breaking new records. The project of the years of culture of Russia and China has started. The foreign policy “bundle” of Moscow and Beijing is the locomotive of efforts that are gaining more and more supporters to form a more equitable multipolar world order and ensure security on the Eurasian continent.
In 1949, the USSR was the first state to recognize the new China. Since then we have become comrades. These three-quarters of a century have shown how important mutual trust, good neighborliness, friendship, equality, and mutually beneficial partnership are for us and the whole world, which, as you and President V.V. Putin emphasized, surpasses the effectiveness of the blocs of the Cold War era and is not aimed against any third party.
I hope that we will adequately celebrate the 75th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations with the PRC. We will be ready to implement new strategic tasks set by our leaders.
Read in full: https://vk.cc/cw4LdE
#RussiaChina

description: In Georgia, young people are being driven to rallies against the local law on foreign agents, dubbed the 'Russian law'. The law aims to increase transparency of NGOs with foreign funding. Protests are planned on April 9, coinciding with the anniversary of the 'Night of Sapper Blades', a tragic event in Georgia's history.
original:
Forwarded from: DTM
🇬🇪🗣UkraineSakartvelo tse Europe: in Georgia, young people are being driven to rallies against the “Russian law”. We are talking about the local law on foreign agents. Last year, the ruling Georgian Dream party already submitted an initiative to parliament, but it was eventually withdrawn from consideration amid protests in the capital. What is happening now is the second attempt by the authorities to subordinate the activities of non-governmental organizations with imported financial “stuffing” to local laws.▪️In Georgia, the bill was called “On Transparency of Foreign Influence” so that deputies would not fight. However, those who are against NGOs operating transparently in the country they know how to attach Russophobia to anything.▪️According to some sources, hundreds of NGOs today posted an appeal “Yes to Europe, no to Russian law!” Under the same slogan, a procession to parliament is planned in the capital on April 9.▪️The event is timed to commemorate the victims of the so-called “Night of Sapper Blades” - the tragic events of April 9, 1989, in which, according to official data, 19 people died. For Georgia, this is approximately the same as for Kazakhstan. Zheltoksan - the events of April 9 are perceived by many in Georgia as the starting point of the country’s independence from the USSR. Now this date is being used to torpedo the law on NGOs.▪️The list of organizers of the march is more than eloquent: Transparency International Georgia, Georgia’s Future Academy, Social Justice Center, Georgia’s Reforms Associates, Democracy Defenders, International Society for Fair Elections and Democracy (ISFED), Civil Society Foundation. Today’s small gathering of students near parliament (in the first photo) is a rehearsal for tomorrow’s protests.▪️In order to increase the degree of Russophobia in society, the opposition is introducing an “anti-foreign agency law” into parliament, which would impose criminal liability for pursuing the interests of the Russian Federation in Georgia. Moreover, the initiative on the transparent work of NGOs , if adopted, will also apply to organizations with Russian funding; the opposition, apparently, did not find it enough. @dntreadonme

event: Death of Opera Singer Evgeny Kungurov
description: The body of opera singer Evgeny Kungurov was found in the center of Moscow. Preliminary data suggests that he committed suicide, having sent a threatening message to his wife shortly before his death. Kungurov was 40 years old and had been struggling with depression, receiving treatment from a psychiatrist.
original:
The body of opera singer Evgeny Kungurov was found in the center of Moscow. TASS, RIA Novosti and the 360 publication reported this the night before, citing sources in law enforcement agencies and emergency services.

Kungurov was 40 years old. According to preliminary data, he committed suicide. Shortly before his death, the artist sent a message threatening suicide to his wife, with whom he was in the process of divorcing.

A TASS source reported that Kungurov was depressed and was being observed by a psychiatrist in one of the private clinics.

———

description: Arina Litvinova, a judge of the District Administrative Court of Kyiv, was found to be a citizen of the Russian Federation. original:
The judge of the District Administrative Court of Kyiv, Arina Litvinova, turned out to be... a citizen of the Russian Federation! 🤯According to an excerpt from the "Rospassport" database, Litvinova acquired Russian citizenship back in 2002 in Yekaterinburg. But she became a judge in Ukraine only after that - in 2008!
So, first - a Russian passport, and only later - a Ukrainian mantle!
Despite the liquidation of the Kyiv District Administrative Court, Arina Litvinova still retains the status of a judge and receives a salary from the budget. In 2023, without doing justice, she "earned" 1.6 million hryvnias!
Litvinova is currently awaiting re-certification. After that, she may find herself... a judge of another Ukrainian court!
"Schem" journalists have evidence of the judge's Russian citizenship. Litvinova herself called it a "provocation". (c) Sergey AndrushkoMore here - https://www.radiosvoboda.org/a/skhemy-suddya-oask-litvinova-rosiyske-hromadyanstvo/32897723.html

For almost 10 years now, the Russian authorities have been declaring “undesirable” NGOs and media outlets they do not like. If earlier this list was replenished slowly, now the list of “enemies” is growing exponentially. In the first three months of 2024 alone, more organizations appeared on it than in the entire 2022. Labeling “undesirable” is not only a method of persecution for the Kremlin , but also the implementation of a policy of isolation from the rest of the world. Forwarded from: Social assistant🇺🇦

However, priority will be given to applications from the cities of Zaporizhia, Kryvyi Rih, Pavlograd, as well as Mykhailivska, Petro-Mykhailivska communities of the Zaporizhia region, Apostolivska and Tomakivska communities of the Dnipropetrovsk region. event: Registration of Azerbaijani TV Channel in Russia

original:
Forwarded from: ADR - Azerbaijani Diaspora of Russia
An Azerbaijani TV channel has passed state registration in Russia. The head of the TV channel, a member of the Union of Journalists of Russia, a veteran of the First Karabakh War, Rafik Aliyev, said that the main goal of “Livetvaz” is to convey information about the culture and history of Azerbaijan in Russian to the Russian audience. “More than a million live in Russia.” Azerbaijanis. Having our own TV channel is a very important event. For now we broadcast only via the Internet.

“Livetvaz” is a Russian TV channel, a TV channel of Russian Azerbaijanis. Of course, we will act according to Russian laws. We have set ourselves the task of dubbing and showing Azerbaijani films in Russian, and Russian films in Azerbaijani.

In addition, we are negotiating the inclusion of “Livetvaz” in the package of Russian television channels of cable television and IPTV operators in Russia.” The television channel has already begun work in test mode and has shown very good results based on monitoring results.

event: Criminal Investigation into Financing of Terrorism
description: The Investigative Committee of Russia launched a criminal investigation into senior US and NATO officials financing terrorist activities. The probe was initiated following a request from State Duma deputies and others. The investigation found that funds from commercial organizations, including Ukraine-based Burisma Holdings, were used to carry out terrorist acts in Russia and beyond, targeting prominent figures and causing economic damage.
original: The Investigative Committee of Russia opened a criminal investigation into the financing of terrorist activities by senior officials of the United States and NATO countries. This was reported by the press service of the Investigative Committee of the Russian Federation."The Main Investigative Directorate of the Investigative Committee of Russia carried out an inspection following a request from a group of deputies of the State Duma of the Federal Assembly of the Russian Federation and other persons about the financing of terrorist activities by senior officials of the United States and NATO countries. Based on its results, a criminal case was opened on signs of a crime under Part 4 of Article 205.1 of the Criminal Code (Criminal Code) of the Russian Federation (financing of terrorism),” the Investigative Committee informed. The department established that funds received through commercial organizations, in particular, the oil and gas company Burisma Holdings, operating on territory of Ukraine, over the past years, have been used to carry out terrorist acts in the Russian Federation, as well as beyond its borders, in order to eliminate prominent political and public figures and cause economic damage.

description: The Ukrainian Armed Forces shelled residential buildings on Petrovka, putting civilians at risk. A ten-year-old boy, Sasha Kravchenko, and his mother narrowly escaped the attack. Sasha has grown accustomed to living in a combat zone and has witnessed multiple incidents of shelling.
original:
The Ukrainian Armed Forces again hit residential buildings on Petrovka. A ten-year-old boy told how he and his mother managed to escape during the shelling.

Sasha Kravchenko’s entire life was spent in a combat zone. He understands arrivals better than many adults. According to the boy’s stories, he and his friends came under fire from the Ukrainian Armed Forces several times. Now it has flown into his yard. It was lucky that he and his mother were at Tekstilshchik at that moment.

And recently, a neighbor’s house caught fire due to a shell hit. Firefighters arrived, extinguished everything and saved people. Sasha, who was watching this, suddenly realized that he also wanted to become a firefighter when he grew up. For now, due to constant danger, he is studying remotely, but he is a good student and especially loves mathematics. He says he really misses his classmates and expects that peaceful life will soon come to his hometown.

Forwarded from: ARCHANGEL SPECIAL FORCES Z🇷🇺
What did the Ukrainian Armed Forces achieve when trying to attack border settlements? PREFACE: Ukraine still does not give up hope for a small victory. The focus of attention was the border villages and cities of Russia.

But at the moment, the Ukrainian Armed Forces have not seen any success in capturing border settlements. Some landed at one end of the Belgorod region, others filmed TikTok on their border. There is one interesting detail: American and other foreign mercenaries took part in all these provocations. This is confirmed by paraphernalia found on the ground, for example, the Pannwitz Action (Wehrmacht Cossacks) flag.

Desperate attempts by the enemy to attack ended in the liquidation of his personnel. We all remember the footage, very similar tactics of the enemy on the Kherson front. GOAL: Breaking through the state border, occupying border settlements, the capture of which could be presented as the inability of the state to protect its citizens. What entails undermining the authority of the President of Russia through attempts to disrupt the elections taking place at that moment. RESULT: The landing of two landing groups using UH-60 Black Hawk helicopters initially provided the enemy with a beautiful picture for TikTok, but all further plans of the Ukrainian Armed Forces were doomed to failure .

Having landed 4 km from the point, the RDK* militants got lost, and then began to rush. Having reached the point, instead of taking up defense in the area to ensure the passage of the main forces, two groups crawled into houses on the outskirts.

As a result, the enemy was destroyed without much difficulty, since he localized himself in the most unfavorable position. *Archangel Spetsnaz organization banned in Russia. Subscribe.

event: Former British Minister Criticizes UK Military Readiness
description: Retired British Minister for the Armed Forces James Hippie expressed concerns about the UK's military readiness, stating that the country is unprepared for war as a 'national enterprise'. He believes that many Whitehall ministries are hoping to avoid a major confrontation, likely with Russia. The UK's Ministry of Defense faces a £17 billion shortfall in equipping the Armed Forces with necessary military equipment.
original:
Forwarded from: Unofficial Bezsonov
Former British Minister for the Armed Forces James Hippie, having retired a couple of weeks ago, decided to frankly describe the situation in the British Armed Forces and government.

A veteran of Afghanistan and Iraq writes in an article for the Daily Telegraph that London is not ready for war as a “national enterprise”. He argues that too many Whitehall ministries are simply hoping that there won't be a major confrontation (presumably with Russia) in the near future. "To be honest, in the UK we are very far behind," Hippy admits.

His words are confirmed by statements by the House of Commons Accounts Committee that in the Ministry of Defense’s plan to equip the Armed Forces with military equipment, the difference between the expected number of weapons and the provided resources amounts to 17 billion pounds sterling in monetary terms, and this money is not an excess, but a shortage. In response, the military department simply pretended that the problem did not exist.@NeoficialniyBeZsonoV

The 328th regiment of the 104th division of the Airborne Forces of the Russian Federation and the 345th regiment of the same division are under review.
original:
Huevy Kherson🇺🇦Photo, The occupiers shot unarmed Ukrainian prisoners of war in Krynyk, Kherson Oblast - the shooting of Ukrainian prisoners has begun: the Prosecutor General's Office is investigating the involvement of two units of the Russian Federation. As the head of the Department of Combating Crimes Committed in Conditions of Armed Conflict of the Prosecutor General's Office Belousov told information about the murder captured Ukrainian soldiers were placed by the Russians themselves.

"There is information about the involvement of the occupiers from the 328th regiment of the 104th division of the Airborne Forces of the Russian Federation.

The 345th regiment of the same division was mentioned in that telegram channel of the occupiers, where such information was first published. That is, at least two subdivisions are currently under review.

We are also checking other units of the Russian Federation that could have been there at that time," he said.

Yurii Belousov also said that information is currently being checked about the members of the Armed Forces of Ukraine who died. Previously, this happened in the Kherson region, near the village of Krynky. ᅠSend news to @hueviy_kherson_Bot👉 SUBSCRIBE

description: On April 9, 1989, Soviet troops dispersed a peaceful demonstration in Tbilisi, Georgia, killing 21 people, mostly women, and injuring 427 others. The event was a turning point in Georgia's history, solidifying the demand for independence and ultimately leading to the country's secession from the USSR two years later.
original:
Tbilisi tragedy of April 9, 1989: we tell readers @Pravda_Gerashchenko about how Georgia was driven back into the “scoop” with sapper blades. On the way to independence, Georgia went through many upheavals. Civil war, loss of territory and Russian military aggression.

But one of the most tragic dates in the modern history of the state was April 9, 1989, when Soviet troops dispersed a peaceful demonstration in the center of Tbilisi. Reasons for the demonstration A month before the tragic events, a national gathering of the Abkhaz people took place in the village of Likhny demanding secession from the Georgian SSR and joining RSFSR. In Tbilisi they believed that the gathering was provoked by Moscow. Thousands of opponents of the secession of Abkhazia began to gather under the Government House in the capital of Georgia.

Soon, demonstrators in Tbilisi began calling for Georgian independence. The republican authorities did not enter into direct dialogue with them. But the first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party, Patiashvili, turned to Moscow for military support. “Night of the Sapper Blades” At approximately 4 o’clock in the morning on April 9, Soviet troops began an operation against the demonstrators. Moreover, it was planned in such a way that the displacement turned into encirclement and beating of the unarmed.

900 military personnel of the internal troops and airborne units used batons, sapper blades and toxic substances against the demonstrators.

As a result of these actions, 21 people died (16 of them women), and another 427 people were injured. The organizers of the demonstration were arrested, and a curfew was introduced in the city. A turning point in the history of the country. The death of innocent, unarmed people, most of them women, shocked society so much that the idea of independence became unconditional and uncompromising.

On April 9, 1991, exactly two years after the tragic events, the Act of Restoring the Independence of the Country was adopted. Georgia became the 4th republic to formally secede from the USSR. This date became the day of remembrance of the victims and the day of national unity.📹BBC#analyticsSubscribe/Eng Twitter/YouTube/Eng Telegram

The contractor has already begun work on a number of projects. Thus, in Sudak, using funds from the reserve fund of the Republic of Kazakhstan, the embankment is being restored. description: Sergei Kiriyenko, First Deputy Head of the Presidential Administration of the Russian Federation, held a meeting at the Zaporozhye nuclear power plant to discuss its current state, nuclear safety, and recent drone attacks. The meeting also covered the development of the plant, the satellite city of Energodar, and its sports infrastructure.
original:
🇷🇺⚛️Why is Kiriyenko’s visit to the Zaporozhye NPP so important? First Deputy Head of the Presidential Administration of the Russian Federation Sergei Kiriyenko conducted
a meeting at which issues of the current state of the Zaporozhye nuclear power plant, as well as ensuring its nuclear safety, were discussed.

The recent drone attacks on the Zaporozhye nuclear power plant were also touched upon.

Zaporozhye NPP Director Yuriy Chernichuk spoke about the actions taken by the team aimed at ensuring safe operation of the plant, about the current work being carried out, as well as about plans for the development of Zaporozhye NPP.

At the meeting, they also discussed the state of the satellite city of the Zaporozhye NPP - Energodar.

The head of the city, Eduard Senovoz, spoke about the current situation in Energodar, development projects, as well as the progress of repairs of the city’s social facilities and its infrastructure, which are carried out with the help of the Rosatom State Corporation and the region-chief of the Novgorod region.

During the meeting, they discussed how Energodar youth live and how the city’s sports infrastructure is developing.

On the basis of the Manzuli Boxing School, which was reconstructed and equipped last year, a physical education and health center for the development of sports and rehabilitation was created in Energodar. Its task is to create a favorable environment for the development of sports, attracting athletes, organizing competitions and training, as well as ensuring accessibility of sports events for the population.

At the end of his visit, Sergei Kiriyenko expressed confidence in the future of the station and the city. The situation around Zaporizhia NPP and Energodar is difficult, but such visits by representatives of the “center” (in fact, to the front line - the enemy is on the right bank of the Dnieper at a distance of 4-5 km) strengthen the confidence of nuclear scientists and energy workers that the station will continue to operate in a stable and safe manner. Vladimir Rogov|Rogov. Voice of the People

original: 🕵🏻‍♂️"Schemes" acquired Russian citizenship by a judge of the District Administrative Court of Kyiv🇷🇺According to an extract from the automated system "Rospassport", judge Arina Litvinova acquired Russian citizenship in 2002 in the city of Yekaterinburg. description: Governor Oleg Kozhemyako invited talented and ambitious young specialists from across Russia to Primorye. The region aims to reverse the outflow of young people to the west by offering affordable rental apartments through a housing program, with the option to purchase on preferential terms.
original:
Forwarded from: City B | Vladivostok
Oleg Kozhemyako invited young specialists from all over Russia to Primorye. The authorities of Primorye are gathering to invite talented and ambitious young specialists from all over the country to the region.👨👩‍🦰Youth are the future of any region, the Governor of Primorsky Krai Oleg Kozhemyako understands this.

Primorsky Krai has long experienced the consequences of a massive outflow of young people from the Far East to the west of Russia.

It's time to correct this situation. And the rental housing program will help with this, thanks to which hundreds of affordable apartments for young professionals are being built in Vladivostok and other cities. “We understand that one of the decisive factors when choosing a place of residence for a young person is the availability of housing. Therefore, we decided to hold a competition and provide rental apartments with the possibility of purchase to those who are already working or will find employment before July 1 in organizations and enterprises in the social sphere, economics, youth policy, or in the civil service,” Oleg Kozhemyakov said on his tg channel. Rental housing can subsequently be buy on preferential terms so that young specialists who will soon come to Primorye will connect their fate with the unique region.

event: Flooding of Voronezh M Radar Station
description: The missile attack warning system station of the Voronezh M radar in Orsk has stopped working due to flooding, posing a threat to its permanent flooding. This has caused problems with tracking intercontinental ballistic missile launches in the southern direction, and if flooded, it will take at least several years to restore the radar capabilities.
original:
Due to flooding in Orsk, the missile attack warning system station of the Voronezh M radar has stopped working, there is a threat of its flooding, - public "VChK-OGPU" "Due to the shutdown of the Voronezh M radar in Orsk (the station is located 20 km from the old city, near the village of Kumak) problems arose with tracking the launches of intercontinental ballistic missiles in the southern direction.

Due to the breach of the dams, the threat of permanent flooding of the radar station is very high. If this happens, it will not be possible to restore the radar “hole” quickly; it will take at least several years,” a source told VChK-OGPU.

event: State of Emergency Declared in Sierra Leone
description: The President of Sierra Leone declared a state of emergency due to an 'existential threat' posed by an epidemic of drug addiction involving cannibalism. The drug, known as Kush, is made from synthetic materials and human bone powder, causing users to go crazy and die from nervous paralysis.
original:
By the way, in general, a lot of interesting and crazy things are still happening in West Africa - cyberpunk is taking a break.

The President of Sierra Leone recently declared a state of emergency due to an “existential threat” - an epidemic of drug addiction involving cannibalism.

Kush are rolled-up cigarettes made from synthetic rubbish, one of the main components of which is powder from human bones.

Freetown sits firmly on the jackpot. The port city, famous back in the days of the slave trade, combines slums and tourist paradise. Slums, of course, to a greater extent. Everyone, from gangsters to garbage sorters and whores, smoke human bones mixed with unknown chemicals, go crazy and die from nervous paralysis.

Grave diggers have become a serious threat, drug addicts are driven out of cemeteries almost by the National Guard, and the police are unable to cope. Flying away from hopelessness into a magical world costs a penny by local standards, such virtual reality is for the poor.

According to him, Russian troops entered there in armored vehicles from the southeast from near Marinka, crossing the railway line. event: Security Agreement in the North Sea
description: Norway, Great Britain, Belgium, Denmark, the Netherlands, and Germany signed a joint declaration to enhance security in the North Sea. The agreement enables information exchange and cooperation to protect critical infrastructure, including gas pipelines and undersea cables.
original:
Forwarded from: Voice of the Norwegian Fjords
⚡️Norway, Great Britain, Belgium, Denmark, the Netherlands and Germany enter into an agreement on security in the North Sea. Six countries signed a joint declaration, which, among other things, makes it possible to exchange information.

Norwegian Energy Minister Terje Åsland said in an interview with NRK: In the North Sea, we have a common interest with our neighbors in protecting our critical infrastructure. Belgium is investing one million euros in a secure communications platform that will help countries cooperate. Here, countries will be able to exchange information about suspicious incidents that could affect the security of North Sea infrastructure, such as gas pipelines.

British Nuclear Energy Minister Andrew Bowie commented on the agreement: The North Sea is driving Europe's renewable energy and net-zero emissions ambitions, while also helping to strengthen energy security on the continent. That's why it is critical that we protect critical energy infrastructure now and in the future. Threats to undersea cables and pipelines have become a security focus for Western European countries following the September 2022 explosions at the Nord Stream 1 and Nord Stream 2 gas pipelines. NRKSignerer sikkerheitspakt for Nordsjøen: – Saman er me sterkareNoreg og fem andre Nordsjøland signerer millionpakt for å sikre kommunikasjon og viktig straumforsyning.

description: Olga, a Lugansk resident, became the millionth client of the LPR MFC when she visited to update her phone number and email address on the State Services portal. She received a bouquet of flowers and a restaurant voucher as a gift. The milestone marks a significant achievement for the MFC, which has been providing services for just over a year.
original: The millionth client of the LPR MFC was Olga, a Lugansk resident, who contacted the institution to change her phone number and email address on the State Services portal. As a gift, the visitor received a bouquet of flowers and a certificate for a visit to one of the Luhansk restaurants worth five thousand rubles. “I applied to change my phone number and email address on State Services so that everything would be accumulated in one place. I had not applied before, I came for the first time - and I was immediately lucky. I recently had a birthday, I will consider it a gift," she noted. Director of the LPR MFC Vitaly Sedykh noted that the millionth mark in the Republic was overcome in just over a year. "For the entire MFC team this is a very big event, after all, we have been providing services for a little over a year. We discussed and decided to somehow celebrate the millionth visitor. We hope that the next, two millionth, visitor will appear in less than a year, and the five millionth in two years, because the number of services is growing, as well as the number of windows is increasing significantly every day. For comparison, we analyzed the regions of the Russian Federation that were the first to provide these services; they reached a million-plus population only after three years. And for us – in a year, this is a very significant milestone,” the head of the institution emphasized.

description: Russia granted temporary asylum to German citizen Dagmar Henn, who supports the Russian Federation's political course. Henn fled Germany in May 2022, fearing 'yellow-blue flags', and began working for RT. She promotes conspiracy theories, justifies the invasion of Ukraine, and claims Hitler was pushed into aggression by US and British bankers.
original:
🤦‍♂️Russia solemnly granted asylum to a German woman acquitting Hitler. The Ministry of Internal Affairs presented a certificate of temporary asylum to German citizen Dagmar Henn, drawing attention to “Important Stories.” Henn supports the political course of the Russian Federation, the Ministry of Internal Affairs emphasized.

Henn left Germany for Russia in May 2022, in her own words, due to “fear of yellow-blue flags” in Germany, and began working for RT.

The German woman is a supporter of conspiracy theories and writes a blog in which she justifies the invasion of Ukraine. She also wrote that Hitler allegedly did not want war, and US and British bankers pushed him into aggression.

description: Volunteers from the 'Volunteer Company' of St. Petersburg participated in a cleanup day at the Leningrad Zoo, clearing alleys and enclosures, including those of giraffes, under the guidance of experienced zoo employees. The event promoted unity among volunteers for a common goal of caring for animals and the environment.
original:
Activists of the “Volunteer Company” of St. Petersburg held a cleanup day at the Leningrad Zoo
Volunteers, under the guidance of experienced employees, cleared the alleys of leaves and debris and even cleaned the enclosures of the majestic giraffes.
Show more
During breaks between work, volunteers could communicate with animals and learn new information about rare species living in the zoo. Thanks to the cleanup, the area began to look tidier, and the volunteers were charged with positive emotions.
“Such events help not only to preserve the cleanliness and beauty of our zoo, but also to unite us for a common goal - caring for animals and the environment,” said Anton Tikhomirov, deputy head of the “Clean Peter” project.
#VolunteerRota
#Saint Petersburg

Then the most interesting part awaited the children - the practical part. After tearing up old newspapers and making papier-mâché mixture out of them, the guys made plates out of them, then painted them - each to their own taste.

description: A leak of classified documents has revealed details about the NSA's global monitoring system, capable of intercepting data and introducing malware. The system consists of two key components: Turmoil for data collection and Turbine for active interference and implantation.
original: NSA Inside Secrets: How the Turmoil and Turbine Systems Work A leak of classified documents reveals details about the NSA's system for global monitoring of Internet traffic, capable of intercepting data and introducing malware. The system includes two key components: Turmoil for data collection and Turbine for active interference and implantation. .Turmoil monitors traffic at key nodes, filtering out valuable data, while Turbine exploits vulnerabilities to install spyware on targets' devices.#NSA#GlobalSurveillance#NSACyberEspionage@SecLabNews

event: Destruction of Ukrainian Equipment and Command Post
description: Artillerymen of the 'Center' group of troops used Krasnopol-M2 ammunition to destroy a camouflaged American M109 self-propelled artillery unit and an underground command post of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the Avdeevsky direction. The target coordinates were provided by scouts, and fire adjustments were made by Orlan-30 UAV crews.
original:
Forwarded from: Russian Ministry of Defense
Artillerymen of the “Center” group of troops destroyed the equipment and command post of the Ukrainian Armed Forces using Krasnopol-M2 ammunition Avdeevsky direction
 
Having received the target coordinates from the scouts, the soldiers of the 2S19 Msta-S self-propelled gun crew arrived at the firing position, aimed the combat vehicle at the target and, using high-precision 152-mm ammunition, destroyed a camouflaged American M109 self-propelled artillery unit of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Fire adjustments and control of hitting targets were carried out by crews of the Orlan-30 UAV. Russian Ministry of Defense
